figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Biogenesis of extracellular vesicles (EVs). Section (a) describes the biosynthesis of exosomes, and section (b) shows the generation of microvesicles (MVs).

claims.sentence: At this point, the secreted ILVs are known as exosomes (Figure 1(a)).
In contrast, MVs are bigger in size (50-1000 nm in diameter) and are created and released by outward blebbing from the plasma membrane (Figure 1(b)) [20].

Figure 1 was created using BioRender application (https://biorender.com/).Data Availability
No data availability statement was included in the manuscript.Conflicts of Interest
The author declares that there is no conflict of interest.References
